meanings.definition: The practice of diagnosing and treating mechanical disorders of the musculoskeletal system, especially the spine, through manual adjustment and manipulation.
meanings.sent1: Chiropractics helped my back pain by adjusting my spine gently.
meanings.sent2: She studied chiropractics to learn about treating spine issues.
meanings.sent3: The chiropractics session felt like a gentle puzzle-solving for my back.
meanings.sent4: His approach to problem-solving was like the intricate techniques of chiropractics.
meanings.sent5: The chiropractics treatment made my spine feel like it was dancing.

meanings.definition: The profession or field of healthcare that focuses on chiropractic treatment.
meanings.sent1: In the field of healthcare, chiropractics plays a vital role in treating spine problems.
meanings.sent2: He decided to pursue a career in chiropractics to help others with their back issues.
meanings.sent3: The hospital comedy show featured a quirky character obsessed with chiropractics.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her patients was as strong as the foundation of chiropractics.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the world of chiropractics as a place of healing and hope.
